page.title: 10LAW and ORDER
page.content: {POLICE}The Police Authority is the Hampshire Constabulary. Most of the area is policed by patrol car or motorcycle by a constable who resides in Micheldever Village. Part of the area around Abbotstone Down is policed from a sub-station in Alresford. Emergency "999" calls are routed to Winchester and are dealt with by the nearest mobile patrol regardless of its base. Follow up action is usually taken by the local constable. Offenders for crimes committed in the area are dealt with by the courts in Winchester.
